channel.title: Jake Kramer on Engineering Health
channel.description: Recent content in Jake Kramer on Engineering Health

item.title: DevAcademy Six Years Later
item.description: Cerner hires a lot of software engineers. In fact, we have hired over 1,600 engineers since our early career onboarding program, DevAcademy, went live almost six years ago. In particular, we use DevAcademy to onboard early career software engineers. DevAcademy is a three part onboarding program built by engineers for engineers. The first part of DevAcademy is DevEssentials which covers a lot of the basics new engineers need to know about development ecosystems in our development environment.
